scripts.cy:run: concurrently --success command-cypress --kill-others --names 'app,cypress' --prefix-colors 'green,yellow' 'npm run dev:services' 'wait-on --timeout 60000 http://127.0.0.1:5173 && npx cypress run'
scripts.dev: concurrently --success command-cypress --kill-others --names 'app,cypress' --prefix-colors 'green,yellow' 'npm run dev:services' 'npx cypress open --e2e'
